channel.title: Black Mesa Full Walkthrough with all Achievments and Full HD ;D
channel.description:
Hey, im doing a Black Mesa Walkthrough.. I try to get all Achievments and the Achievments that i Lost i do after the project in an extra Video!
Please help me to do better videos.
I upload every Day a new Part since Part 14. On Weekend 2 Videos oder more per Day!
Watch, Rate, Comment an subscribe pleeease c:
Part 1: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cYyXo9iFjBY[/url]
Part 2: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pufHCRj0Sz8[/url]
Part 3: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qXfVFO5-UdY[/url]
Part 4: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_PaKnw20big[/url]
Part 5: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U8kO94FHW5o[/url]
Part 6: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Klmt6J4qO2s[/url]
Part 7: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A-hq_pemEjU[/url]
Part 8: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4xWBsBzVDDo[/url]
Part 9: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DA5f-R8reP0[/url]
Part 10: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L05eRgP1MWo[/url]
Part 11: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yWHaXSb-7pE[/url]
Part 12: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=muaq0Ki1AGw[/url]
Part 13: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J-rZD-Zlcmw[/url]
part 14: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6bbv_a4ZiuM[/url]
Part 15 At this Time every Video will be 1080p and really good Quality [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J1tsKRv2PZU[/url]
Please help me to make better Videos (Comments, tipps and Rate the video) And if you like my project.. you can subscribe c: I do a Walkthrough of all Half-Life games after the Black Mesa Project.. And a Let's Play too c:
Your, NANEx
PS: I hope you like it and help me c:

item.title: Black Mesa Full Walkthrough with all Achievments and Full HD ;D
item.dc:creator: Cheerios
item.description:
Nice walkthrough. I especially like the fact that you are not jabbering your mouth off while going through the game. Too many walkthroughs have folks yapping and it is too distracting.

item.title: Black Mesa Full Walkthrough with all Achievments and Full HD ;D
item.dc:creator: nikose
item.description:
Thanks for the walk through.
I saw that you jump very high at part 6 (03.44 -04.10) to reach the venting hole through pipes.
I cant jump so high. I managed to climb a barrel to the first pipe, and i did the same for the first horizontal pipe. Now i have jumped across but i cant grab any barrels to climb to the last pipe that guides to the venting hole.
How you can jump so high??
You make it seems so easy!!!
I have spend the last 4 hours for something you did at 14 secâ€™s at your walkthrouth and i an not finished yet!!!

You tube link

Read full topic
